text:
Lake Siegel Bell (born March 24, 1979) is an American actress, director, and screenwriter. She has starred in various television series, including "Boston Legal", "Surface", "How to Make It in America" and "Childrens Hospital", and in films, including "Over Her Dead Body", "What Happens in Vegas", and "It's Complicated".
Bell was born in New York.

annotations.surface_form: How to Make It in America
